jump_scares.spoiler: A vehicle suddenly crashes into Michelle’s car
A loud noise startles Michelle
Howard bangs his fist on the table loudly
A disfigured woman bangs on the window
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
A knife suddenly pierces the air vent in front of Michelle
A knife once again pierces the air vent
Michelle runs over the mailbox
Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
Accompanied by a sound effect, a man clutches his chest suddenly
A deer runs onto the road and is hit by a car (we get a couple of seconds warning before impact)
An apparently dead man floating in a pool of water suddenly spasms
Lockhart removes the toilet lid and a large number of eels crawl out from underneath
A man appears from behind a corner and attacks Lockhart
Lockhart and Hannah crash their bike into an oncoming car
During a dream, Tricia approaches her husband who has his back turned to her. He suddenly turns around and is shown to be missing his eyes
Tricia suddenly has a vision of her husband as she closes the door
While lying in bed, Tricia has a vision of her husband kneeling over her
Tricia sees her husband standing behind the lawyer
While meditating, Tricia hallucinates that her husband is beside her whispering in her ear
There is a strange chirping noise in the room next to Daniel and Callie, seconds later a large insect like creature crawls past
As Callie investigates the bathroom, something comes out from behind the shower curtain and the screen goes black
The insectoid briefly appears out of the darkness before the screen goes black again
With a loud thud a pack of syringes drops from the chimney
The slit closes onto Scott’s fingers
Kate opens doors, startling Nick
Tony has abrupt flashbacks of Kate falling
A creature jumps towards the phone camera
“I see you” message appears on the TV
Abrupt jump cut with a sound effect
Nick jumps onto Tony
TV explodes
Tony breaks through the glass pane
A shadowy figure passes the window behind James and the camera footage cuts out
An image of James with a disfigured face briefly flashes across the camera footage
A loud bang in an otherwise quiet scene may startle some people
Anne shines the torch on a figure standing in the darkness
An invisible force appears to drag Patient 11 away
Patient 11 suddenly screams and pounds on the observation window
Anne sees a mysterious figure standing by the window
There is a loud bang followed by screaming
Anne shines the torch on Callie who now has black eyes and is vomiting a red liquid
Patient 14 begins to scream and shake violently
Patient 14 suddenly appears in front of the scientist
Anne looks in the car mirror and sees Thomas’s face has turned a red color
A hand grabs Anne around the ankle as she walks up the stairs
Thomas wakes up in the back seat and yells which startles Anne
A researcher gets an electric shock
The corpse on the examination table suddenly screams and grabs the researcher around the neck
Anne looks into a hole built into the wall and a pale face with hollow eyes suddenly appears
Anne looks down a corridor and sees an alien figure coming towards her
Something begins to bang on the door
A hand with long fingers suddenly appears on the locker that Anne is hiding in
Anne turns around and sees a grotesque figure standing beside her
Anne turns around and sees her friends face has the same black eyes and deformed expression as previous victims
A loud sound over intercom interrupts Odell
A lightbulb explodes
A radio turns as Stumbo is getting close the body, causing him to fall backwards down a ladder in fright
As Claire pushes the closet door closed it suddenly opens back up and an image of a man flashes across the screen
Brice shines light on some men as he turns around, frightening him
A manta ray charges towards the camera
A loud banging sound frightens the group
Odell shines the flashlight down at the water and Coors’ dead body suddenly rises up from it
Odell grabs Claire on the shoulder, causing her to scream
Wallace begins to freak out and shout as Odell touches his shoulder
Claire grabs the files and when she turns back around Odell is standing right in front of her
An unseen person suddenly suffocates Clare with some plastic wrapping. [Video]
Accompanied by a sound effect, the scene cuts to Clare’s corpse on a rocking chair
Peter startles Jess by throwing some clothing on her while she is on the phone
Billy reaches out with his hand and grabs Jess’s hair
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the camera quickly pans to show Peeping Tom’s feet stepping in front of Feldman
As Feldman looks up, Peeping Tom suddenly jumps up right in front of the camera
Mary looks down from the railings to the first floor, and gasps as the camera cuts to the strange man staring directly at her from downstairs
A man gets sliced into chunks by one of the traps
A phone rings during a tense scene
A squawking bird suddenly flies at Amanda
Marcus trips over during a quiet scene
A doll enters the room and walks up to Giordani
An unknown assailant comes through the window and strikes Giordani
Marcus shines the torch on a skeleton
An abrupt cut back to Martha in the present may startle some viewers
In Doctor Thurman’s office, Donnie screams “I can see him right now” and, accompanied by a sound effect, the camera cuts to Frank who is standing in front of him
Ricky (one of the bullies) grabs Gretchen in Grandma Death’s cellar
There is a loud explosion on the plane
A body falls and hits a truck
An elevator drops down close to the building’s repairman
Someone falls onto the top of the elevator causing a loud bang
The devil appears from behind the people who are still alive
As Alice is looking at Margaret, there is a sudden cut to someone’s face in the darkness, and a male voice hums a melody
A sudden cut to some blurred imagery of lights in a darkened room
A sudden cut to footage of female dancers reflected in a distorted mirror
As Margaret’s husband pulls the curtain, there is a brief flash of some face with wide open eyes for 2 frames
A sudden cut to footage of twitching dancers in disturbing makeup
Another cut to the same footage of dancers in makeup, closer to the camera this time, as the eerie music becomes louder
Another cut to the same dancers in disturbing makeup, now up close and with one of them lunging at the camera. A second later, Alice wakes up from a nightmare
A sudden cut to a closeup of an opening eye
Another cut to the same eye
An extended creepy sequence of visions begins
A face in disturbing makeup suddenly appears in the foreground, and Alice jolts awake in the bathtub
Kale’s mother surprises him while he is looking at the neighbors through his binoculars
Kale looks around Mr Turner’s house with the binoculars and sees Mr Turner staring at him through a window
Kale closes the fridge door and Mr Turner is standing behind it
There is a loud noise from Mr Turner’s house and blood splatters on the window
There is an abrupt cut back to Mr Turner’s house, accompanied by a sound effect
Ashley runs into another girl while on the phone at the store
Mr Turner appears in front of Ashley as she drives out of the car-park
Kale opens a wardrobe door and sees an apparently unconscious Ronnie lying there. Suddenly Ronnie jumps up and scares Kale
Mr Turner breaks into Kale’s room with a baseball bat. [Video]
Kale turns his head and sees a dead body beside him
Mr Turner’s face can be seen watching Kale through the window
A dead body floats up beside Kale while he is in the water
Mr Turner appears behind Kale’s mother after he frees her
As Sloane hides in the apartment, suddenly the phone on the table rings
Sloane is pulled forward under the table
As Gwen walks through her apartment and passes the mirror again, you suddenly see the figure of a man. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Patrick is suddenly grabbed from behind
Patrick’s arguing with Sullivan. Suddenly, one of the soldiers standing around them is shot
Sloane and Melanie are talking. As Sloane turns around again, the doctor’s hand suddenly comes out of the bushes and grabs her
Patrick is looking for someone with the flashlight. When he turns around, there’s a man standing behind him. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Melanie runs with Sloane and Damon through the water in the cave. She grabs a rock and shines into a dark corner where suddenly a man is standing
After Damon says “Lets go” he is suddenly attacked by the doctor from the side
Sloane sees a double of her. After she says “I will never be you again”, the doctor attacks her
Patrick is suddenly attacked by Melanie with a knife
Sloane is attacked again by her double
Behind Melanie a man suddenly jumps out of the water and pulls her in
During a quiet establishing shot of a stately room, a man suddenly falls through the roof
Danny suddenly falls through the ice
As Ben says “I have the antidote” he is suddenly tackled by Jason
As Zoe says “Ben, get up”, she is suddenly attacked by the Game-master
A sudden noise comes from the locked room when the family is eating dinner
As Jin-Seok is attempting to open the door,  his brother comes quietly and makes Jin-Seok scare
Jin-Seok is attacked by a frightening woman standing on his right
Roses’s car runs into a deer
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina can be seen walking past the hallway in the background of the shot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris spies Georgina looking out from a window in the house
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina turns around and looks at Chris
During a tense scene, Chris closes a door to reveal Rose is watching him
After a long period of silence Chris suddenly runs at Dean and attacks him
As Chris goes to leave, Jeremy runs up and grabs him from behind
Chris drives into Georgina
The side mirror beside Chris is suddenly blown off by a gunshot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris turns to the side and sees Rose looking at him
The title screen suddenly appears accompanied by a scream
An ornament shatters
The walkie talkie makes a screeching noise
After Tony shines the torch around and says “hello”, several birds suddenly fly away
Accompanied by a sound effect, Tony shines the torch down a hallway and sees a girl in the distance
There is a loud bang on the door
A hand appears in the bottom right corner of the screen
As Tony approaches the door there is a loud bang
The door slams shut behind Tony
As Tony struggles with his torch, a ghoulish girl who is missing an eye appears in front of him
Professor Goodman sees movement from the upstairs room and as he pulls back Simon is standing right behind him
Simon hits a figure with his car as he talks on the phone
There is a loud bang on Simon’s car
Simon leans back to reveal a figure at the driver’s side window
Accompanied by a sound effect, Goodman sees a ghostly image of himself inside the car
As Priddle approaches the baby crib, the towels behind him are suddenly flung into the air
The hooded figure in the distance suddenly appears directly in front of Goodman
There is the sound of glass breaking somewhere in the house
The ghoulish Maria suddenly races towards Priddle
The hooded figure suddenly jumps out of the crib behind Goodman
A bird flies into the window
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
Becky calls out to Cal. She turns around and a woman suddenly emerges out of the grass (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
After hearing a noise, Travis crawls towards the tall grass to investigate. He then turns around and Tobin is right behind him
As Cal follows Becky, Ross suddenly puts his hand on Cal’s shoulder
Cal looks across and sees his own corpse lying beside him (this is accompanied by a sound effect)
A car tire blows out
Alice is suddenly hit by a car
Someone attacks Caroline
Ed finds a severed head in the dryer
Ginny puts her head up to the door and Lou suddenly bangs on it from the other side
In the mirror Ginny sees a shadow moving across the room
Officer Rhodes grabs Ginny
Ed surprises Paris
A car suddenly explodes
Paris bumps into Ed
Timmy suddenly appears beside Paris
A hand breaks through the glass in the cell where John is staying
After waking from a dream, John looks across and sees the deformed policeman sitting beside him. [Video]
The strange cyclist appears in front of Linda while she is driving and she crashes into him
The cyclist appears behind Linda before driving off
An arm comes out from behind the door and grabs Linda on the shoulder
Linda grabs John from behind as he goes back into his room
The scene cuts to a creature making a screeching noise
Sutter Cane’s head appears beside John
The door to John’s cell starts to shake
A shadow walks past the screen, accompanied by a loud noise
A shadowy figure appears behind Meera
There is a loud gunshot
A barking dog lunges at the car window
A car horn sounds and a car crashes into Meera
Meera looks up to see a masked man pointing a gun at her
A hand suddenly knocks on the car window
A picture falls off a cabinet
Meera switches on a light to reveal a person tied to a chair
Christina suddenly wakes up and Meera screams
Meera turns around to run and immediately runs into Henry
Henry suddenly grabs Meera by the shoulder and throws her
Meera suddenly Strikes Henry from behind
After a tense scene the spaceship explodes mid sentence
Jacob sees some birds flying above him at the party
Jacob sees a horn come out of Jezzie’s mouth as she dances
A sudden cut to a car braking and hitting a bike might startle some viewers
Jacob sees the reflection of his son in the mirror and reaches out to touch it however a demon head appears and he pulls back
Darry is surprised by rats as he looks into the pipe
A hand reaches out of the body bag and grabs Darry around the ankle. [Video]
A crow caws loudly, startling Trish
Darry suddenly appears at the car window. [Video]
A phone rings
There is a gunshot, followed by a second gunshot a few seconds later
The creature drops down onto the windscreen in front of Darry and Trish
The creature jumps down onto a police officer and kills him
The creature comes around a corner while Darry, Trish, and Jezelle are arguing
The creature grabs Jezelle around the head
The creature bursts through the door of the interrogation room
Jay looks in the mirror and a ball hits the window
Jay walks into the kitchen and a girl half naked and peeing walks towards her
The door opens and an unsettling tall man is standing behind Yara in the door-frame. [Video]
Jay opens a closet and the back wall falls apart revealing Kelly behind
Jay crawls towards the shed’s broken door and a boy jumps into the hole
A cult member runs at Jay
The homeless man suddenly yells “Shut up!” startling Jessica
A box is thrown in front of Jessica
Jessica sees a figure with a bloody pentagram on their face through the window on the door
The lights turn back on and we see two more bloodied figures with bags over their heads standing behind Jessica
There is a loud static noise as the bag-headed man moves around
The homeless man moves away from the door to reveal several figures hanging from the ceiling
The homeless man suddenly appears back at the window
A door slams
Jessica is knocked unconscious as she approaches an open door
Jessica sees a woman with a disfigured face under the table
The disfigured woman runs past the opening that Jessica is hiding in
Jessica opens her eyes and the disfigured woman is right in front of her
The homeless man passes behind Jessica
Jessica tases the homeless man and he turns to reveal a disfigured face with eyes that appear to have been removed and then stitched back into his head
The camera pans back up and one of the bag-headed cultists is standing behind Jessica
We see a close up of the bag-headed cultist’s face
Paymon screeches at Jessica from behind

Esther turns the lights on and off several times seeing the silhouette of a woman in the darkness each time. As Ether turns the lights off once more, the silhouette of the woman suddenly appears much closer to Esther than previous times
As the lights turn back on, the figure appears standing behind Paul
Paul is suddenly dragged away into the darkness
A shadowy figure appears on the other side of the door that Martin looks through
As the room goes dark once again, the silhouette attacks Rebecca
Rebecca is pulled towards the ceiling by Diana
Martin looks up and sees Diana directly above him
Martin is suddenly pulled under the bed
As Martin backs away, Diana appears behind him
Martin is dragged along the floor by Diana
Diana pulls Bret away
Diana suddenly appears directly in front of Bret
Diana jumps out at Bret as he runs down the driveway
Sophie is thrown to the floor as she reaches for her pills
Rebecca shines the black light on a figure with its back turned to her, it suddenly turns around and screams
A hand grabs Rebecca around the wrist
Diana attacks a police officer
A hand reaches for Rebecca out of the slightly ajar door behind her
Diana drops down behind Rebecca
Abby suddenly attacks the man who picked her up
The police officer attempts to break down the door, frightening Owen
Owen shouts at the police officer, causing him to turn around, Abby then jumps up and attacks the police officer from behind
The face from Alice’s phone footage suddenly comes towards the camera. [Video]
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek
Madison suddenly gasps as she sees a dead body
A shadowy figure suddenly slams the front door shut as Madison is trying to escape
Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest
A horrible face appears from around the corner as two men approach. [Video]
A teenage boy jumps out with a gas mask on and  growling to scare Sarah
The same teenage boy is suddenly stabbed all the way from the back of his head and out through his eye socket, pushing his eyeball out
Sarah is suddenly grabbed from behind
Harry Ward is shot from behind just as he was about to attack Tom
‘Frank The Trucker’ opens his cab door, only to see Harry Ward in the cab, immediately followed by Harry Stabbing Frank through the top of his skull
A sudden sound cue and visual of pool balls being hit
Tom turns around and is suddenly attacked by Harry Ward
Tom turns around in the cage only to be face to face with the killer
Harry Ward suddenly appears and attacks Ben Foley
The lights in the grocery store abruptly and loudly turn off
The pick-axe goes through the door missing Sarah’s face by a hair
Harry Ward suddenly appears at the window
Ex-Sheriff Burke suddenly bangs on the car window
The deputy opens the bloodied dryer door and a steaming, grotesque head falls out
Ex-Sheriff Burke turns around and is immediately stabbed by Harry Ward
Harry’s shadow appears on the wall
A miner’s uniform suddenly falls
Harry ward suddenly appears
Tom swings a pick-axe at his rescuer, stabbing him through the head
A drone appears in front of Ian as he climbs the crane
Paul wakes up and Annie is standing directly over his bed
Annie shoots Buster through the back with a shotgun
Annie jumps on Paul as he crawls away
Mother walks backwards towards the house and her husband suddenly puts his hands on her shoulders
Mother walks towards a wall to and there is a loud rumbling noise
Mother closes a cupboard and the guest is revealed to be standing behind it
During a suspenseful scene Mother bends down to pick something up to reveal one of the brothers standing behind her
As Mother attempts to make a phone call, her husband suddenly appears in the house
Mother looks out a dark window when a light is turned on to reveal a man smiling at her from outside
Mother crawls along the floor and is suddenly grabbed by her husband
Alan trips over a box
Alan briefly glimpses a strange lady with strange mirror eyes
During a dream, Kaylie turns away from the mirror and is attacked by Alan
Kaylie is about to remove a sheet covering a statue when she is surprised by one of the delivery men. [Video]
There is an abrupt flashback to a young Kaylie and Tim attacking the mirror
Marie, who is chained to the wall in her room, tries to attack young Kaylie. [Video]
Young Tim opens the door to Alan’s study and the lady with the mirror eyes appears behind Alan
Kaylie turns around and sees her mother. [Video]
When Kaylie turns around again, the lady with the mirror eyes is standing right in front of her
Tim opens the door and Kaylie sees Marie standing in the doorway
Young Tim and Kaylie run around a corner and come across Marie
Marie grabs Kaylie
Alan shoots Marie
Young Tim and Kaylie run past the lady with the mirror eyes
A young girl’s screaming face appears at the window of a burning building
A young woman leans over a pond when a hang emerges from the water and pulls her in
The hand grabs a cat and pulls it into the pond
A car horn sounds as Brian is nearly run over
There is a loud explosion while Brian and Beth are talking
Beth is surprised by Taylor’s appearance in the room. [Video]
Beth opens a closet door and a puppet hanging from the ceiling drops down in front of her
A hand holding a phone appears beside Taylor
A shadowy figure passes behind Beth
Beth runs into Jack
A hand reaches out from between some doors to grab Beth
Jack shines his torch on a figure in the corner of the room
Beth shines her torch on a decayed corpse
The corpse begins to move towards Beth
A doorbell rings during a tense scene
Griffin goes to open a cupboard door when Eric puts his hand on the other door-knob, startling Griffin
Griffin pulls at something in his wardrobe which causes a toy clown and assorted old junk to fall down
A squirrel crawls out of the wall in front of Griffin and Eric
A toy keyboard turns on by itself
A hand from the inside the TV touches Maddie’s hand
Griffin’s comic books have been mysteriously stacked up in a triangular shape
There is a loud thunder clap
A flash of lightning reveals a corpse standing in the room beside Kendra
A hand forms out of the mud and grabs Kendra
The clown suddenly moves onto the floor in front of Griffin
The squirrel jumps at the bars of the cage
Griffin moves the torch around the room and stops on the toy clown, which then proceeds to attacks Griffin. [Video]
A tree branch grabs Griffin as he runs down the stairs
A hand appears and drags Madison away
A chair suddenly flies into the wall
Amy touches Eric on the shoulder
Boyd begins to drill a hole through the closet but his hand is suddenly pulled through the hole
Boyd’s hand is repeatedly pulled into the hole by an unseen force
Eric reaches towards a figure who appears to be Maddie, however when the figure turns around it is revealed to be a ghost. [Video]
A spirit, standing behind Maddie, hits the camera
Maddie is suddenly pulled up the stairs
A loud thump comes from somewhere in the house
A ghost appears beside Maureen (it gradually fades in which lessens its impact somewhat)
A glass falls to the floor and breaks from behind Maureen
Several loud thumps over the next minute or so may startle some viewers
A bottle tips over and falls on its own
An alarm goes off during a tense and quiet scene
A man reaches out to Daniel from behind after Daniel hides his brother in a closet
While kissing Alex, Grace looks up at the mirror and sees Aunt Helene watching them
As Grace peers out into the hallway, a hand suddenly grabs her around the mouth and pulls her back
As the maid calls out for Georgie, she is suddenly shot in the head
A maid is suddenly shot in the mouth with an arrow
Tony suddenly stands up and hits Alex over the head
Grace opens the elevator and sees a maid hiding in there
Grace picks up the torch and shines it on a goat
As Grace rests on the steering wheel, she looks up just as Stevens appears by the window
Various characters suddenly explode over the next couple of minutes
As Arbogast reaches the top of the stairs, a figure comes out of the bedroom and stabs him
Lila turns around the figure sitting on the chair and it is revealed to be the corpse of Norman’s mother, a few seconds later Norman rushes in wearing his mother’s clothes and a wig
The doors to the cemetery vault that Teddy and Chuck are in burst open
Teddy has several disturbing dreams, during one of them, a girl who appears to be dead, suddenly opens her eyes
As Teddy and Chuck go exploring in Ward C, a guard comes around a corner and startles them
An inmate jumps out at Teddy and Chuck as they are exploring Ward C. [Video]
The inmate comes out of of the dark and grabs Teddy
An inmate reaches out of his cell and tries to grab Teddy
Teddy runs into Dr. Naehring as he is trying to escape without notice
An explosion in a previously quiet scene may startle some viewers
Sudden gunfire may startle some viewers
An alien like figure can be seen on the roof
Graham’s dog leaps at him
Merrill watches video footage of a children’s birthday party where an alien comes into view. [Video]
Graham sees an alien claw underneath the pantry door. [Video]
Loud banging noises can be heard
More banging noises are heard
An alien hand grabs Morgan from behind. [Video]
An alien can be seen in the reflection of TV. [Video]
A stuffed rabbit toy suddenly turns its head towards Heather
A knife suddenly impales Harry
There is a sudden scene change to a close-up of a pop tart popping out of a toaster
A homeless man’s face suddenly transforms into a disfigured eyeless head
A man startles Heather
Vincent appears behind Heather, startling her out of her hallucination
A figure crosses in front of Harry as he opens a door
A man turns around to reveal his eyes and mouth are sewn shut
A monster (The Missionary) drops down behind Douglas and attacks him
The Missionary appears once more and pulls Douglas away
There is a loud metallic clanking as a door opens
Heather has a dream of Alessa in Silent Hill
Alessa’s image briefly flashes across the screen
Vincent is grabbed by The Missionary
Heather is startled by one of the statues
The statue turns to Heather and opens its eyes
The spider-like creature attacks Heather
Heather shines her torch on a monster
Leonard rushes out of the darkness at Heather
A prisoner grabs at Heather through some bars. [Video]
The doors burst open as Vincent is wheeled in on a hospital bed
Heather looks to her left and sees a man in a gas mask beside her
Kaylee drops her flashlight and screams as Kevin comes back from the bathroom
A hand grabs the doorframe and Kaylee screeches
Kaylee’s eyeless and mouthless face suddenly appears on screen with a loud droning whine sound
The shot of the toy phone cuts to a near identical shot where the phone is smiling wider and looking at the camera, accompanied by a loud ringing
A large gush of blood spills out of the hall accompanied by a scream. This shot repeats 3 times

movies.title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw

jump_scares.spoiler: The camera cuts back from the mannequin to the cop to reveal a man in a pig mask who suddenly attacks him
Fitch quickly removes the cloak to reveal a pig mask underneath
As Fitch is walking away, he is jumped by the man in the pig mask
After showing the spiral for a few seconds, there is a loud glitch sound and the video cuts away to a pig doll
Zeke opens the car door and a dead pig falls out, startling him
The camera pans around the room to reveal the man in the pig mask in front of Angie
There is a sudden loud cut from Zeke sitting in his car to him screaming
As Zeke walks out the door, he is attacked by the man in the pig mask
Marcus turns back around and is jumped by the man in the pig mask
Some viewers might be startled at two stabbings at this point
Woman says “talk to me” and turns to see a man in front of her
Woman says “talk to me” again and a woman appears in front of her
Woman barks like a dog suddenly
Man says “I let you in” and head tilts backwards
Boy bites girl in the hand
Some viewers might be startled at man lunging at woman
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
Greta is surprised by Malcolm
Greta is pulled into the family portrait before waking from a nightmare
The attic door suddenly closes trapping Greta inside
Greta sees a figure causing her to scream and fall down
The attic stairs pull up as Greta and Malcolm are talking
During another nightmare, Brahms’ head suddenly snaps back after Greta moves it
A mirror shatters beside Cole
As Greta and Malcolm try to escape they run into Brahms
Greta goes to open a door and Brahms is standing behind it
Greta sees something move while looking through a gap
Brahms breaks through a wall behind Greta and Malcolm
After a long period if silence, a door slams loudly
Gray jumps out at Deacon as he investigates a strange noise. [Video]
Gray turns and is startled by a dog standing in front of him
There is a loud noise as Mark appears to hit his head on something
A book falls to the floor
A door slams
The crucifix falls off the wall
Father Crellick who appears to be dead, suddenly grabs Gray by the arm
Deacon kicks a beer can during a tense scene
Several lights suddenly explode
A panicked Gray runs into Deacon
The camera cuts out for several seconds before coming back to Gray who is screaming in agony
Mr Tuttle enters the house, surprising John
John sees a boys face in the reflection of the bathwater
A window breaks as John is walking around outside the house
A wine glass on the table suddenly goes flying and smashes into a cabinet. [Video]
The mirror breaks in front of John and there is an image of Captain Dewitt with blood on his forehead. [Video]
A loud bang startles Claire
The wheelchair suddenly moves and begins to chase Claire. [Video]
(1:38:38) A sudden phone call may startle some viewers
(00:18:29) Oh Young-sook suddenly kills the police officer with a knife
Harry goes out onto the balcony and sees a bloodied hand on the neighboring window accompanied by a high pitched scream. [Video]
The title credits appearing on the screen accompanied by a sound effect may startle some
A door opens loudly
After seeing water drip on the floor, Carlos looks up and La Llorona is hovering right above him
La Llorona suddenly runs out of the shadows and grabs Chris around the arm
As Chris shuts the car door, La Llorona appears at the window
The car lock suddenly pops up
Sam lifts the umbrella out of the water and La Llorona suddenly appears in front of her
An unseen force suddenly pushes the door open as Anna holds Chris
The alarm clock suddenly goes off
La Llorona suddenly rushes at Chris from behind the curtains
La Llorona comes out of the room behind Chris and tackles him
La Llorona pushes Sam under the water
Chris points and says “Mom”, causing Anna to look around and see La Llorona’s face right beside her
There is a loud roar from upstairs
Anna and the childen look up to see La Llorona towering above them
The figure under the tablecloth suddenly rushes at the children
The glass behind Rafael suddenly cracks
An unseen force hurls Sam backwards
A shrieking La Llorona suddenly swims at Anna as she approaches Sam
As the sheet drops to reveal La Llorona’s reflection, the glass shatters and she screams at the children
The camera is zoomed in on a sleeping woman’s face, then suddenly cuts to a zoomed out shot to reveal Paul whispering something into her ear, accompanied by a loud sound
During a very misty scene in which almost nothing is visible, the empty man suddenly comes into view right in front of the camera and attacks Davara
There is a sudden cut and a screech during a flashback
James looks out into the hallway and sees a shadowy figure that suddenly springs up to reveal that it’s the empty man
There is a sudden cut to the empty man screeching and running towards the camera
A man bangs on the car window, startling Sara
During a dream, Sara unzips a tent to reveal a girl however the girl’s face suddenly turns demonic
Sara removes a sheet from a body and sees a decayed corpse
An elderly lady suddenly lunges at Sara
Something moves just outside the tent
Sara looks out of the tent and has a vision of an old lady running towards her
Sara turns around and sees a girl watching her
A skeletal figure appears behind Sara
A girl appears behind Sara calling her name
Sara looks through a reel of photos and a man’s face suddenly pops up in front of one of the images
An apparently dead man suddenly sits up and screams
Hands reach out of the ground to grab Sara
Michi looks into the forest and sees Sara’s spirit which rushes at him
A piece of masonry falls to the floor in front of the camera
A chair slides along the floor
The windows in the truck shatter
A fisherman is suddenly impaled by a knife
The glass on the clock breaks
Father Malone appears from the shadows startling Kathy
Static hisses from the radio
A cupboard opens startling Elizabeth
A corpse falls onto Elizabeth
The piece of driftwood suddenly sparks and catches fire
The fisherman suddenly collapses as he approaches Elizabeth
Accompanied by a sound effect, a large hairy arm reaches out and grabs Dan while he stands by the door
A figure appears in the doorway by Mrs. Kobritz
One of the revenants can be seen watching the car from a distance
A hand breaks through one of the windows in the church
Stevie is suddenly attacked by one of the revenants
Yoko turns around in the attic and sees a ghostly woman’s face
Karen opens a door and a hand grabs her foot
A cat yowls, scaring Karen
Karen is startled by the phone ringing
A shadow can be seen passing a window
Emma gasps and a ghostly figure can be seen hovering above her
A hand comes out of a bath tub and grabs a man’s arm
Someone reaches down and grabs the cat on the stairs
A boy pops out from beside Jen’s bed and hisses at Matt
The boy screams at Matt
The boy peers down from above Matt and screams again
As Susan goes up in the elevator, the strange boy can be seen on each floor
The ghostly woman peaks out at Susan from under the covers
Karen sees the reflection of the ghostly girl in the bus window accompanied by a croaking noise
As Alex walks down the stairs, the strange boy can be seen sitting in a corner
Detective Nakagawa is reviewing the security footage when a shadowy figure rises up directly in front of the security camera
The boy opens his eyes then pushes Detective Nakagawa’s head into the bathtub
A corpse falls down from the attic in front of Peter
The ghostly woman can be seen in the reflection of the mirror as Karen walks past it
Doug’s hand reaches out and grabs Karen’s foot as she looks into the mirror
Karen opens a door and sees the ghostly woman’s face behind it
Karen goes to lift the sheet covering Doug’s body when it begins to twitch
The camera begins to pan, revealing the ghostly woman is standing behind Karen
A woman is suddenly shot in the head after saying “that almost hit me”
There is a loud explosion after a man steps on a mine
A pig suddenly drops onto the ramp startling the group
Martin is suddenly shot in the head with bloody results
Matt sees a frightening vision in a basement window
A figure can be seen in a mirror as Sara opens a closet door
Matt turns around to see that the water Sara is mopping the floor with has turned to blood
Some plates fall on the floor and break
Matt gets a shock from the door in the basement
Matt has a vision where his hand sinks through a pillar and gets stuck in rotting meat
Matt begins to have another vision
Sara turns around and is surprised by Matt standing in the doorway
A figure runs past Matt
The door slams behind Matt
One of the corpses in the mortuary begins to move
Several of the tattooed corpses are now standing around Matt
Matt sits up and comes face to face with a burnt figure
The burnt figure disappears in a bright flash
Matt starts to have another vision involving Jonah and Aickman
Wendy wakes up as a bird hits the window
As Wendy goes to lift a sheet covering the bird, a foot suddenly appears in view
Sara turns on the bed-side light and sees a corpse standing in front of her. [Video]
The furnace door shuts as Nicholas tries to examine it
Jonah’s spirit suddenly moves closer to Sara and Matt
Jonah’s spirit now stands right behind Sara and Matt
Nicholas looks in the rear view mirror and sees a burnt corpse
A corpse flashes up on the screen during a flash-back to Jonah
The shower curtain suddenly wraps itself around Wendy
An axehead breaks through the door in front of Wendy
A corpse falls down in front of Matt and Sara
After a quiet opening scene, the title screen abruptly appears accompanied by a loud sound effect. This may startle some viewers
There is a loud bang as Carver and Anna walk past one of the Halloween maze traps. [Video]
There is another loud bang as Anna and Luke run past the same trap on the way back
David bangs on the fence as Luke hides
David stabs Anna in the leg
When Cecilia flees the house, she runs into a dog bowl after she came out of the room with the suits. Although the bowl is visible, the loud bang is very shocking
After Cecilia gets into the car, her husband runs out of the forest and hits the car window
Sydney is suddenly slapped by the invisible man while talking to Cecilia
As Cecilia tilts the bucket of white paint from the attic, the invisible man suddenly appears right in front of her
After Cecilia turns off the tap in the kitchen and looks around she is suddenly grabbed by the invisible man
The invisible man suddenly appears beside Cecilia under the trunk

movies.title: The Last Voyage Of The Demeter

jump_scares.spoiler: The quick montage of the various shots of the ship ends with a sudden unrelated shot of Dracula lunging at the camera before the screen cuts to black
Culminating the long suspenseful scene, something suddenly moves inside the pile of dirt, startling Clemens who yelps and jumps back
Olgaren moves the spyglass and sees a closeup of Dracula’s face
Someone grabs Clemens by the shoulder from behind
Dracula moves and jumps at Petrofsky
The hatch of the cargo hold in the foreground of the shot is bumped from below
A flash of lightning reveals Dracula standing behind Larsen
Dracula jumps down at Larsen from the mast above him
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a closeup of Toby’s fingers opening the door with a loud sound
Olgaren bangs on the door after a drawn out moment of quiet tension
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a shot with loud voices and frantic movement happening in the foreground
Olgaren snarls and lunges at Clemens
Clemens, Captain Eliot and others see Dracula through the hole in the door
Dracula jumps down and grabs Toby
Abrams is hit in the head from behind
A cut to a closeup of Dracula’s snarling face
Toby’s eyes open, revealing milky white color
After several seconds of suspense, Dracula suddenly flies directly at the camera out of the mist
Captain Eliot turns around to see snarling Dracula right behind him
Will suddenly swerves to avoid something on the road
Will stands up and smashes his glass
David shoots Miguel
A bloodied Sadie runs into Will
Will slaps the gun out of Pruitt’s hand
Laura suddenly commits suicide. No classical jump-scare but a very frightening scene with a loud bang
Grace breaks through the ice
After the dog barks, the camera shows various settings of the dark lodge. Suddenly a loud cut to Grace standing in front of the piano follows
In a nightmare Grace sees something under the ice on the lake. She suddenly breaks in
As Richard runs towards Grace, a shot is fired and kills him. Very distressing and sudden
A bloodied hand comes out of the darkness startling the praying nun
The nun on the ground is pulled away into the darkness
The corpse of the nun hanging from the rope suddenly drops to the ground as a group of ravens fly away
The camera pans around Frenchie several times before a nun corpse drops from a tree knocking him to the ground
After watching a shadowy figure move across the room, Irene looks up at the statue of Jesus when Valek suddenly appears behind Irene’s shoulders and glass shatters over her
Shortly after lighting a match in the coffin, Burke hears some noises and Valek’s hands suddenly grab him and pull him down
A nun grabs Irene by the hand as she approaches the praying nuns
After Burke touches the veil of the abbess, she suddenly turns to reveal she has been possessed by Valek
After Irene picks up a bead from the floor, a nun is standing directly behind her
As Irene looks at the rosary, Valek’s hands break through the wall behind her
As a screaming Irene flees, a hand is placed over her mouth by one of the nuns
As Burke walks towards the exorcised boy, Valek suddenly appears
We see a top down shot of the nuns praying together in a circular pattern. The scene briefly goes quiet before an unseen force flings the nuns across the room
After Burke investigates the ringing noise, a hand reaches out of the ground in front of him
After Irene begins to pray a possessed nun attacks the group
Something roars at Frenchie from the darkness as he walks through the catacombs
A faceless nun appears behind Irene. As she turns around to talk to it another nun appears from the side and attacks her
Frenchie hears a noise as he moves through the group of nuns
There is another slight scare as a nun’s head jerks down behind where Frenchie is standing
As Frenchie approaches Irene she suddenly looks up and roars revealing she has been possessed
The possessed boy from the exorcism drops down behind Burke
A loud gunshot
Beth wakes up to a loud noise
A screaming woman runs by in the distance
A woman suddenly appears and runs by Beth
Claire’s foot falls through the wooden floor
The bathroom door slams shut
A bathroom door is suddenly pushed open
Maya closes a cupboard revealing Jurgis behind her in the mirror
The sudden appearance of a moth-like figure on the road causes Mary to swerve and crash the car
Mary gasps and appears shocked to see her husband sitting beside her bed
John turns over in bed and has a vision of his wife lying in the bed beside him
John smashes his head into the mirror. [Video]
Accompanied by a sound effect a hand reaches out towards the camera
Accompanied by a sound effect, the silhoutte of a bird moves past a window behind Jess
As Jess looks through the window we get a quick cut to a closeup of the bird as it flies past the window once more
As Jess reaches out to pick up the toy tractor it suddenly moves towards her and a sound effect plays
A shadow moves past screen
Some ghostly legs can briefly be seen under a sheet as Denise makes the bed
An apparently dead bird suddenly squawks and flies away as Jess prods it with a piece of wood
The stairs suddenly collapse and several ghostly screams can be heard over the next minute or so
Ghostly hands reach out and grab Jess
There is a sudden transition from a quiet scene back to Jess being held back by the ghostly hands
John taps on the window
Accompanied by a sound effect, the camera suddenly zooms out
A shadowy figure moves past the screen
There is a loud bang
Ghostly hands grab Jess once more
The ghost grabs Jess around the ankle
A short, jarring flashback might startle some viewers
Accompanied by a sound effect, a figure walks past the screen
After staring at Jess for several seconds, the ghost suddenly lunges at her
There are a couple more sharp flashback cuts
Accompanied by a sound effect, Denise runs into John
The door slams shut on Jess and Bobby
The door bangs loudly as Jess approaches it
John smashes into the door from the other side causing Jess and Bobby to flee
The pitchfork comes through the door, narrowly missing Jess
John suddenly stabs Roy in the back
A hand comes out of the mud to grab Jess around the ankle
Kate jumps out of a box to scare Matt as a joke
While Kate is lowering a dead bird into the soil, some objects suddenly fall down on the ground right behind her
While Matt is touching a wall, Kate suddenly calls out to him, frightening him and causing him to jump
Matt opens the door, frightening Shane and causing him to drop the snow globe and shatter it
After Matt says “It’s not loaded,” Shane suddenly fires the gun to the ground as a warning
There is a loud noise from the roof of the house
A brief flash of a man’s bloodied mouth closing in on the camera may startle some viewers
There is a loud thud as a bird flies into a wall
There is a very short flashback to the Japanese man coming towards the screen
A rocking chair unexpectedly moves as a child screams
There is a sudden vibrating sound
A figure unexpectedly appears, followed by a perfectly timed scream
After a somewhat intense scene, Catherine turns around quickly and bumps into her husband
A clown lamp explodes
A door slams shut
Something large suddenly crashes through the bedroom window
Sally is suddenly shot
Jess is attacked from behind
There is a loud gunshot
A flock of seagulls begin to squawk
A bird flies into the windscreen
After a girl enters the Vision Quest building, a mechanical owl jumps out at her
Jason, wearing a mask, jumps out at Zora in the bathroom
A Frisbee whizzes past Adelaide and Kitty as they talk on the beach
There are several loud bangs on the door
A masked person pops up outside the window beside Zora
There is a loud crash as a boy crawls out from behind Zora, Jason, and Adelaide
After Jason runs to Adelaide, his doppelganger suddenly appears in the hallway behind him
Adelaide grabs a saucepan and swings around to attack one of the doppelganger twins who jumps on her
The Zora doppelganger breaks through the sun roof
The doppelganger girl reaches out towards Adelaide as she searches for her in the bushes
The mechanical owl jumps out at Adelaide as she enters the house of mirrors
Claire gets a shock from the bathroom power socket
An eye appears suddenly on the other side of the fence hole that Claire is looking through
Claire is startled by the phone ringing
The radio turns on suddenly
Claire looks into various rooms of her neighbours house with binoculars, in one of the rooms she sees Warren looking at her
Claire turns around and her husband is standing right behind her
The reflection of another woman can be seen in the bathtub water
The door opens during the Seance and the dog Cooper walks in
A reflection moves in the steamed-up bathroom mirror
Norman closes the fridge door and Claire is standing behind it
Norman appears behind Claire
Claire’s head falls back and she briefly appears as a decomposing corpse, startling Norman. [Video
Norman’s hand appears over the side of the bathtub
Claire stands on something sharp and screams
Norman’s fingers twitch as Claire tries to get the phone
Norman appears in the rear window of the ute
A loud sound of breaking branches and movement in the trees
A sudden sound and movement of something very close
Something grabs Dave by the ankles and throws him around
Finn pulls back a tarp to reveal a wolf
Trisha opens a window blind and screams
Finn pulls on something he finds buried in the snow, and pulls up an arm
Jeanine pulls off a tarp covering a dead body
A hand reaches for Jeanine’s shoulder from behind
Pete gets dragged out of bed
Cecily suddenly appears
Jeanine suddenly appears
A blinding light suddenly turns on
A blinding light suddenly turns on
Devon is suddenly stabbed at the same time as something kicks open the guest house front door
A flashlight turns on revealing a face
Marcus gets hit by a truck
Gwen is shot in the head
As the back door is opened, Trisha is there
An arrow strikes Finn
The werewolf is hit in the back of the head with a shovel
The werewolf jumps on Emerson’s back and attacks
